entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kouchibouguac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:14 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 2:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:41 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 1:41 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:41 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
